article: julio ramirez , an unlicensed agent once associated with unk capital group , entered into an arrangement with a top political adviser to former new york controller alan hevesi , to secure investments from the new york state common retirement fund for unk 's clients , said new york attorney general andrew cuomo .
abstract: agent enters guilty plea in n.y.
